alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 12:30PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Pelican Lake near Watertown affecting Codington County. .Warm temperatures and the recent snowmelt continue to keep the river levels elevated. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pelican Lake near Watertown. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1713.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 PM CDT Wednesday was 1713.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1713.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening by 930 PM CDT.
